title: The AlexNet Moment
description: Learn The AlexNet Moment in one minute.

hook.text: September 2012. A deep neural network smashes the ImageNet competition. The error rate drops by 10%.

buildup.text: AlexNet used deep convolutional layers trained on GPUs â€” techniques others had dismissed.

discovery.text: It proved deep learning could outperform all hand-crafted feature engineering approaches.

twist.text: The winning team had just three people: Krizhevsky, Sutskever, and Hinton.

climax.text: Within a year, every top ImageNet entry used deep learning. The paradigm shifted overnight.

punchline.text: Three researchers, two GPUs, one revolution.

quiz.question: What did AlexNet prove about deep learning?
options: Deep neural networks could vastly outperform hand-crafted approaches
GPUs were useless for AI training
